long_description: A very soft top you'll want to wear everywhere, the Lole Gina top lets you take style into your own hands. Its drawstring neckline changes the look from off-the-shoulder style to a scoop neck. Cotton, viscose and polyester fibers make up a fabric that feels great next to skin and has a little stretch. Rib-knit waistband and side seams; 27 in. length. Lole Gina Top has front hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: A very soft top you'll want to wear everywhere, the Lole Gina top lets you take style into your own hands. Its drawstring neckline changes the look from off-the-shoulder style to a scoop neck.
